snippet.title: Every Letter - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Write letters on your typewriter based on people's requests in this cozy Violet Evergarden-inspired game.

--- This free indie game is available now at violetfairy.itch.io/every-letter ---

Go through a day of your new job as a letter writer, typing everything from casual hellos to love letters and theater scripts.  Enjoy a light story, over a dozen possible letter requests, and beautiful hand drawn art in this wholesome, slice-of-life, non-violent writing game.
